Info: Originally named Ardwick Association Football Club in 1887, the club became Manchester City in 1894.
Arsenal FC was the first club from the South of England to join The Football League, in 1893.
Founded in 1878 as Newton Heath LYR Football Club, Manchester United is one of the most successful clubs in England.
Established in 1892 by the merger of Newcastle East End and Newcastle West End, the club has a historic ground, St. James' Park.
Liverpool Football Club was founded in 1892 and has won multiple European Cups.
Founded in 1901, Brighton & Hove Albion, known as the Seagulls, play at the Amex Stadium.
One of the oldest clubs in England, Aston Villa was founded in 1874 and has a rich history of success.
Founded in 1882 as Hotspur F.C., Tottenham has been the first club to achieve the League and FA Cup Double.
Established in 1889, Brentford FC has recently gained promotion to the Premier League.
Fulham FC, founded in 1879, is London's oldest professional football club.
Crystal Palace Football Club, formed in 1905, is known for its vibrant atmosphere.
Chelsea Football Club was founded in 1905 and has become one of the most successful clubs in England.
Commonly known as Wolves, they were founded in 1877 and have won the FA Cup four times.
Founded in 1895 as Thames Ironworks, West Ham United plays at the London Stadium.
Originally known as Boscombe FC, Bournemouth was established in 1890.
Founded in 1865, Nottingham Forest is known for winning the European Cup twice.
Established in 1878, Everton has competed in the top division for a record 117 seasons.
Founded in 1884 as Leicester Fosse, Leicester City is known for its miraculous Premier League win in 2016.
Leeds United was formed in 1919 and has a history of domestic success.
Southampton FC was founded in 1885 and plays at St Mary's Stadium.
